sentences.sentence: Welcome, detective. There’s been a murder in this building, and you’re here to uncover the truth.
Your notebook will be your most valuable tool. Press 'I' to access it and review your findings.
You can interact with objects using 'E'. Examine everything carefully—you never know what clue you might find.
When you're done looking at an object, press 'Escape' to stop inspecting it.
To get started, you’ll need to speak with every resident in the building. Each one has something to hide.
The truth is out there, detective. Now, go find it.
